sourcesContent:
Your Basket is empty!

Enjoy Upto 50% Savings on Grocery

import { Component ,OnInit} from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-price', templateUrl: './price.component.html', styleUrls: ['./price.component.css'] }) export class PriceComponent implements OnInit{ length="default"; ngOnInit(): void { let localitems=localStorage.getItem('localUser'); if(localitems){ if(localitems.length>0){ this.length='local' } } let user=localStorage.getItem('user') if(user){ this.length='user' } } }
